text: Lacmellea oblongata is a species of tree in the family Apocynaceae native to south-eastern Colombia, Ecuador and Peru.Plants of the World Online (KEW) The tree is utilized for its edible fruit and latex. ==References== ==External links== *Lacmellea oblongata at useful Tropical Plants. Category:Rauvolfioideae Category:Flora of South America Category:Flora of Central America Category:Plants described in 1941
title: Lacmellea oblongata
